title: Does the US military play a role in the presidential elections? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. That is absolutely unconstitutional. Marine General Milley, current Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, recently reiterated this point.

The only role the military has in presidential elections is the same as you and me.The right to vote, I know from expirence that active duty personel are encouraged to vote ,but beyond that they are not allowed to take any actions to convince people to vote a cirtain way or choose a cirtain person for any office they are not to campange for any single person or props.
